title: Document Validation Gates Integration
description: Validation gates component exists and is referenced in ATEF v2.0 but integration patterns are unclear. Need to document how gates integrate with task workflow and provide usage examples.
completion_notes: Created comprehensive validation-gates-integration.md documenting how validation gates integrate with the task workflow. Documentation covers: 3 gate types (pre/mid/post execution), integration with complete-task workflow (starting/during/completing tasks), integration with breakdown and environment creation, gate configuration in agent-config.json, logging and monitoring, error handling, CLI interface, best practices (gates as hard stops), performance impact, and troubleshooting. Validation gates provide mandatory quality checkpoints that prevent errors through pre-validation of task readiness, progress verification during execution, and completion validation before marking tasks finished.
notes: Validation gates seem powerful but underutilized. Need clear documentation on when gates run, what they check, and how to customize.
assumptions: Gates are integrated into complete-task workflow
decision_rationale: Powerful feature that's underutilized due to lack of clear documentation and examples.
